content.rendered:
Ocean Freight

Experienced. Licensed. Bonded. Secure.

Ocean Cargo Transportation

Excel Cargo is a licensed ocean cargo transportation provider as a Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier (NVOCC). Our professional logistics team has significant ocean cargo transportation experience and the financial stability you can depend on. We have built an extensive network of cargo agents delivering value to our customers’ in over 185 countries worldwide.

Excel Cargo Logistics offers a comprehensive LCL program that effectively co-loads with other third parties to build consolidated boxes to reduce customer shipping expenses and transit time. All LCL ocean cargo transportation services are accompanied by a suite of IT solutions including shipment tracking and order monitoring. By working with our carrier base, we offer a fast, cost-efficient and reliable LCL service, to support your company’s competitiveness.

Door to Door Ocean Cargo Transportation Management

When an ocean cargo shipment arrives at a United States port, Excel Cargo Logistics can transport it to any destination utilizing our advanced carrier network. Our customers have the option of drop-and-pull, and drayage services for full container loads in any of the countries where we conduct business.

Our ocean cargo shipping and logistics service solutions are designed to deliver value, reduce costs and improve efficiencies. These services are centrally managed through a single point of contact. Key services include; purchase order management, origin services, quality control, and supplier management.
